You are an expert in bug report analysis. The following is a description of a bug report. Please find the relevant environmental information mentioned, such as operating system, hardware configuration, software version, etc., and the answers should be concise.

llamafactory-cli train \
    --stage sft \
    --do_train True \
    --model_name_or_path /root/autodl-fs/llama3-8b/Meta-Llama-3-8B \
    --preprocessing_num_workers 16 \
    --finetuning_type lora \
    --template llama3 \
    --flash_attn auto \
    --dataset_dir data \
    --dataset env_train_modified \
    --cutoff_len 1024 \
    --learning_rate 0.0002 \
    --num_train_epochs 10.0 \
    --max_samples 1300 \
    --per_device_train_batch_size 2 \
    --gradient_accumulation_steps 8 \
    --lr_scheduler_type cosine \
    --max_grad_norm 1.0 \
    --logging_steps 5 \
    --save_steps 100 \
    --warmup_steps 0 \
    --optim adamw_torch \
    --packing False \
    --report_to none \
    --output_dir saves/LLaMA3-8B/lora/train_env \
    --fp16 True \
    --plot_loss True \
    --ddp_timeout 180000000 \
    --include_num_input_tokens_seen True \
    --lora_rank 8 \
    --lora_alpha 16 \
    --lora_dropout 0 \
    --lora_target all

llamafactory-cli train \
    --stage sft \
    --model_name_or_path /root/autodl-fs/llama3-8b/Meta-Llama-3-8B \
    --preprocessing_num_workers 16 \
    --finetuning_type lora \
    --template llama3 \
    --flash_attn auto \
    --dataset_dir data \
    --dataset env_test_modified \
    --cutoff_len 1024 \
    --max_samples 600 \
    --per_device_eval_batch_size 2 \
    --predict_with_generate True \
    --max_new_tokens 512 \
    --top_p 0.7 \
    --temperature 0.5 \
    --output_dir saves/LLaMA3-8B/lora/eval_env \
    --do_predict True \
    --adapter_name_or_path saves/LLaMA3-8B/lora/train_env
